text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm taking a walk in the park on my<n>day off when I hear
someone call out<n>to me.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Ah, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: What a coincidence, meeting you<n>here.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I'm strolling around without a<n>destination... Or put simply,
I'm just<n>taking a walk. I often spend my<n>weekends doing
so.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
My friends like to say that I'm good<n>at idling away time, but
as an<n>American, I find the scenery here to<n>be a delight.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Besides, even on my days off, I grow<n>restless if I don't get
at least a little<n>exercise.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I can enjoy the spirit of this country<n>as I move through it...
Walking is a<n>form of entertainment for me. ♪

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Still, I've seen all there is to see in<n>this area, so I'm
pondering where to<n>go next.
choice_data_list: How about I show you somewhere?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Somewhere good for a walk? That<n>would be wonderful.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure you know of some delightful<n>areas that I'm not
yet familiar with.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, I gladly accept your offer. Let's<n>have a nice stroll,
just the two of us.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I come up with a few places she<n>might not be aware of, and
we set off<n>together to see them.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
To think there was a tea house<n>tucked away so close by. I
had no<n>idea!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
What a lovely slice of Japanese<n>tradition, undisturbed by the
trendy<n>boutiques around it.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Look, so many items on the menu<n>use my favorite
ingredient—matcha. ♪

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
...Ah, but it may have been a mistake<n>coming here. These
sweet treats are<n>so tempting... ahhh...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Grass and I continue our walk,<n>visiting various local places
of<n>interest...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I enjoy my usual quiet walks, but<n>today's outing has been
delightfully<n>stimulating too. You've shown me so<n>many
things.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Where shall we go next, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Thinking on Grass Wonder's request,<n>I have a look around
and happen to<n>see something interesting.
choice_data_list: How about that arcade over there?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: An arcade? I can't say I'm very<n>familiar with such places...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
It might also not be the best place to<n>have a calm and
relaxing walk...
choice_data_list: But you might discover something new.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Something new...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
That's true. In the course of our walk<n>so far, I've made a
number of such<n>discoveries.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
...All right. Since I'm on this rare walk<n>with you, I shall trust
in your advice.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: It really is a lively place.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Trainer, what sort of game is this?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Grass Wonder curiously eyes a<n>dance game controlled by
foot<n>movement.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
A game one plays by performing<n>dance steps? It sounds
not unlike a<n>Winning Concert.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: What? Who... me?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Well... I have been trained indancing, so I suppose I might be ableto...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
All right, I'll do it. But please, don't<n>laugh when you see me
making a<n>mess of things.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Grass Wonder begins playing while I<n>watch.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Um... Hm... A-ah?!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: My winning concert experience...<n>didn't exactly translate.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Oh, but I certainly enjoyed myself<n>nonetheless. I even got
some exercise<n>out of it.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I didn't know there were games like<n>this. I'm learning about
many new<n>things today.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
This is yet another discovery I've<n>made thanks to our walk
together.<n>Thank you very much for coming with<n>me,
Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I'd love it if you could join me for<n>another walk sometime. ♪

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Now, let me try this just once more...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
"To speak without words"... Amazing,<n>you understood my
reasoning without<n>the need for explanation.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Keep watching—I'm going to clear this<n>next one.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Ohhh... This is more difficult than I<n>anticipated.
choice_data_list: Shall we move on to something else?
Shall we move on to something else?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
My—are you jesting? Why, I've still<n>barely begun to exert
myself.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
That's why I'm going to play one<n>more time. For the
exercise, you<n>understand!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Our day together continues until<n>Grass Wonder finally
masters her<n>dance game skills.
